string.value: TRAITOR|Well well, look who’s there! Now we’ll see who gives orders here! You will pay for persecution of our brethren.
DRUID|So you betrayed me... I do not blame you, ignorant child. But any evil will be punished, such is the law of the live. I pity you...
TRAITOR|Cut the rubbish, old man! You, go to Uluk to get you reward.
|See you there.
|We are finally here. I was afraid we will never get out of this stinky hole. Do you have any acquaintances here?
ALICE|Actually I do. But they won’t help you.
|Who are they?
ALICE|My old friends with shadowy past. They dislike strangers so you wouldn’t like to go see them without invitation.
ALICE|I’ll stay with them, while you are looking for the Oracle. When you are done, meet me there.
REFUGEE|Run, hurry! We still may be saved!
REFUGEE|Save us, good man! We refused to adopt the belief of new masters of Uluk. Now the heretics are chasing us!
|Do not be afraid! Together we will repulse the attack! Let anyone, who can keep weapon in their arms, fight!
REFUGEE|Hooray! Enough running away! We shall fight for our lives!
|We have won the battle, but not the war. The heretics may return any minute now. Hurry to Seth! We’ll be safe there.
REFUGEE|Thanks for the help! You gave us hope, noble stranger!
|I couldn’t save them...
|What a queer machine. Now I see what druids are afraid of. This abomination gives me creeps.
|It’s not the first time I fight with the monsters! My cause is right and I will crush the enemy!
|Stonehenge defilers are dead. I must inform the druids.
|Holy stone is in place. I gotta get out of here before the mother earth’s wrath falls upon the profaned ground.
|I barely escaped. The nature is mighty indeed!
|Druids of Seth will be happy to learn what happened here.
Do you wish to travel to another region?
I don’t know the way, so I’ll better stay here.
There’s something strange about this place. I don’t want to go there.
